Html:
Hello all! I have successfully setup and implemented WSUS Package Publisher, it is quite nice and I wonder why I haven't deployed this product before.

I do have a question regarding best practice. Currently I have my applications packaged as a silent exe installer (created with 7-zip) which installs the application but then performs quite a few additional steps such as creating/deleting files, registry keys, etc.

So my questions is this, is there any benefit to creating a custom update in WSUS Package Publisher or can I just continue to use the silent exe installers and import as a regular update?

Cheers!
Hello, If the silent Exe installer fits your needs, use it. Custom update have been created to fill the gap between classic installer and Wsus admin needs.
